title: An Unexpected Proposal - Novel Updates
tags: Abandoned Children   Animal Characteristics   Aristocracy   Bloodlines   Character Growth   Cute Children   Death of Loved Ones   Depression   Determined Protagonist   Doting Love Interests   Early Romance   European Ambience   Fallen Nobility   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Human Experimentation   Long Separations   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Manipulative Characters   Misunderstandings   Nobles   Persistent Love Interests   Possessive Characters   Pregnancy   Royalty   Schemes And Conspiracies   Special Abilities   Strong Love Interests   Time Skip   Tsundere   Villainess Noble Girls   Weak to Strong
author: 해사
description:
She spent the night with the man who destroy her country, fleeing with their child in her arms. With that, she believed their relationship had come to an end.

'Even if he's another man's child, even if he's not of my blood, or even if he's the child of a bastard, I'll raise him as my own.'

Until he came to her with eyes as ferocious as a beast.

'Don't even think about running away using the boy as an excuse. I'm still struggling to control the urge to crush the little creature that took you away from me.'>
